choices.description: complex shapes represented with an ensemble of symmetric shapes

choices.description: randomly oriented irregular ice crystals present a greater mean projected area than spheres

choices.description: Integrated ice water path through the cloud kg m-2

subProcesses.label: Deep Convection

properties.label: Scheme Name
properties.description: Deep convection scheme name

enum.label: Deep Convection Scheme Type
enum.description: Type of scheme used for the parameterisation of deep convection.

properties.label: Scheme Method
properties.description: Deep convection scheme method

enum.label: Deep Convection Scheme Method
enum.description: Method used for deep convection closure for determining cloud-base mass flux.

choices.label: CAPE
choices.description: Mass flux determined by CAPE, convectively available potential energy.

choices.label: bulk
choices.description: A bulk mass flux scheme is used

choices.label: ensemble
choices.description: Summation over an ensemble of convective clouds with differing characteristics

choices.label: CAPE/WFN based
choices.description: CAPE-Cloud Work Function: Based on the quasi-equilibrium of the free troposphere

choices.label: TKE/CIN based
choices.description: TKE-Convective Inhibition: Based on the quasi-equilibrium of the boundary layer

properties.label: Processes
properties.description: Physical processes taken into account in the parameterisation of deep convection

enum.label: Deep Convection Scheme Processes
enum.description: Processes taken into account by the deep convection scheme

properties.label: Microphysics
properties.description: Microphysics scheme for deep convection. Microphysical processes directly control the amount of detrainment of cloud hydrometeor and water vapor from updrafts

enum.label: Convective Microphysics Scheme Type
enum.description: Convective microphysics parameterization scheme

choices.description: Cosmic rays are the main source of ionization in the troposphere and lower stratosphere.

properties.description: Horizontal discretisation type

enum.description: Type of horizontal discretisation scheme

properties.label: Scheme Method
properties.description: Horizontal discretisation method

enum.label: Dynamical Core Discretisation Horizontal Method
enum.description: If the scheme type is fixed grid, describe the scheme method for the horizontal discretisation scheme

properties.label: Scheme Order
properties.description: Horizontal discretisation function order

enum.label: Function Order
enum.description: Discretisation function order

properties.label: Horizontal Pole
properties.description: Horizontal discretisation pole singularity treatment

enum.label: Dynamical Core Discretisation Horizontal Pole
enum.description: Method used to handle the pole singularities

properties.label: Grid Type
properties.description: Horizontal grid type

enum.label: Grid Type
enum.description: Type of horizontal grid

properties.label: Coordinate Type
properties.description: Type of vertical coordinate system

enum.label: Dynamical Core Discretisation Vertical Type
enum.description: Type of vertical coordinate system

choices.label: sigma
choices.description: allows vertical coordinate to follow model terrain

choices.label: hybrid sigma-pressure
choices.description: sigma system near terrain and isobaric above

properties.label: Name
properties.description: Name of atmos model code

properties.label: Keywords
properties.description: Keywords associated with atmos model code

properties.label: Overview
properties.description: Overview of atmos model.

properties.label: Model Family
properties.description: Type of atmospheric model.

enum.label: Model Family Type
enum.description: Type of atmospheric model

properties.label: Basic Approximations
properties.description: Basic approximations made in the atmosphere.

enum.label: Basic Approximations Attributes
enum.description: Basic approximations made in the atmosphere

subProcesses.label: Resolution
subProcesses.description: Characteristics of the model resolution

properties.label: Horizontal Resolution Name
properties.description: This is a string usually used by the modelling group to describe the resolution of the model grid, e.g. T42, N48.

properties.label: Canonical Horizontal Resolution
properties.description: Expression quoted for gross comparisons of resolution, e.g. 2.5 x 3.75 degrees lat-lon.

properties.label: Range Horizontal Resolution
properties.description: Range of horizontal resolution with spatial details, eg. 1 deg (Equator) - 0.5 deg

properties.label: Number Of Vertical Levels
properties.description: Number of vertical levels resolved on the computational grid.

properties.label: High Top
properties.description: Does the atmosphere have a high-top? High-Top atmospheres have a fully resolved stratosphere with a model top above the stratopause.

subProcesses.label: Timestepping
subProcesses.description: Characteristics of the atmosphere model time stepping

properties.label: Timestep Dynamics
properties.description: Timestep for the dynamics in seconds

properties.label: Timestep Shortwave Radiative Transfer
properties.description: Timestep for the shortwave radiative transfer in seconds.

properties.label: Timestep Longwave Radiative Transfer
properties.description: Timestep for the longwave radiative transfer in seconds.

subProcesses.label: Orography
subProcesses.description: Characteristics of the model orography

properties.label: Type
properties.description: Type of orographic representation.

enum.label: Orography Type
enum.description: Type of orographic representation

properties.label: Modified
properties.description: If the orography type is modified describe the adaptation.

enum.label: Orography Changes
enum.description: If the orography type is modified describe the time adaptation changes

choices.label: modified variance if taken into account in model (cf gravity waves)

properties.label: Time-varying
properties.description: Describe any time varying orographic change

subProcesses.label: Tuning Applied
subProcesses.description: Tuning methodology for atmospheric component

properties.label: Description
properties.description: General overview description of tuning: explain and motivate the main targets and metrics retained. &Document the relative weight given to climate performance metrics versus process oriented metrics, &and on the possible conflicts with parameterization level tuning. In particular describe any struggle &with a parameter value that required pushing it to its limits to solve a particular model deficiency.

properties.label: Global Mean Metrics Used
properties.description: List set of metrics of the global mean state used in tuning model/component

properties.label: Regional Metrics Used
properties.description: List of regional metrics of mean state used in tuning model/component

properties.label: Trend Metrics Used
properties.description: List observed trend metrics used in tuning model/component
